metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17528 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: backends/platform/sdl/posix/posix.cpp in ScummVM 1.9.0 does not validatestrings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environmentvariable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injectionattacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: scummvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
